@Typical japanese MainCharacter Not always, i think your overgeneralizing a lot here, while yes working as a vtuber is less risky then as an idol, being a vtuber actually takes a shit ton of work. You saying all virtual idols are like that is a huge overgeneralization, there's no doubt that there are probably some smug and egotistical vtubers, but that shouldn't mean all of them are the same. look at youtubers for example. Logan Paul is a shit human being, does that mean pewdiepie is? or jacksepticeye? you shouldn't let a few influence your view of all of them. Now if I mistook what you were trying to say, then sorry. please tell me a bit clearer what your intent was cause i would like to know. anyhow, ima go back to fapping to doujins, I have used all my brainpower for today
